formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["verification@equifinance.com"],"subject":"Employment Verification – Jane Smith & Jacob Johnson","body":"Dear Ms. Martin,

Thank you for contacting NexTech Solutions regarding your employment verification request.

I can confirm the following information:

• Jane Smith – currently employed full-time with NexTech Solutions in the role of Software Engineer. Start date: 12 March 2020. Employment status: Active.

• Jacob Johnson – currently employed full-time with NexTech Solutions in the role of Project Manager. Start date: 7 June 2018. Employment status: Active.

No disciplinary actions are on record for either employee and both remain in good standing with the company.

Please let me know if you require any additional information or the completion of a specific verification form. I will be happy to assist.

Kind regards,

John Doe
HR & Talent Operations
NexTech Solutions
hr@nextechsolutions.com
(555) 123-4567"}

formatted_items.content: Employment verification email sent to EquiFinance Credit Bureau confirming the current status and start dates of Jane Smith and Jacob Johnson. Let me know if you need anything else!
